dmca.title: [EV1-C2504504T] FW: FA Premier League Satellite Services Infringement - FAPLSatServic

To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not

Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

MIME element (text/plain)
-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Cooper [mailto:TimC@nr-online.com]
Sent: 10 January 2007 11:36
To: Contact@nortechsatelliteservices.co.uk
Cc: abuse@ev1.net
Subject: FA Premier League Satellite Services Infringement -
FAPLSatServices_NRID13826
Importance: High
Sensitivity: Confidential 
 
NetResult Internal Reference:  FAPLSatServices_NRID13826 
 
Please quote the above FAPLSatServices_NRID13826 reference in all
communications with us regarding this issue. 
 
Dear Sirs, 
 
I am writing from a company called NetResult based in the UK, we work on
behalf of the FA Premier League and handle their intellectual property
rights online. We have noticed that the site
http://www.nortechsatelliteservices.co.uk/index.html is offering
satellite viewing cards for sale. 
 
The viewing cards for sale are for the channels ART/MBC which are the
Middle Eastern and North African broadcasters for the FA Premier League.
It is illegal for these channels to be broadcast out of their respective
territories and by offering them outside of these markets; NORTECH
Satellite Services is offering an illegal service to customers. 
 
The site is selling illegal satellite viewing cards for ART and in turn
this enables viewers that purchase the cards to view FA Premier League
broadcasts illegally. 
 
Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your
web sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so. 
 
I have attached a copy of a letter from ART that references how and when
it's viewing cards can and cannot be used. 
 
Please contact me with any questions. 
 
Kindest regard, 
 
  
Tim Cooper 
 
NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA 
 
Tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1735
Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB

 
Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action. 
 
 
MIME element (application/pdf) 
MIME element (text/plain)
